name: Demoness
description:
Demoness is a smash-inspired Beat'em'up set in the void, a world underneath hell where restless souls wander eternally.

You remember nothing, and the only thing keeping you from being swallowed by the void's numbing merged consciousness is a feeling of intense hatred.

*The build is about 80 mb currently, sorry for the wait time. It will stay black for a few seconds before the loading screen appears*.

*Please note that all graphics are subject to change, and there are MANY placeholders that will be completely replaced.*

*Impressions, comments, suggestions, critiques are welcome.*
